name: Bloody Boobs
description: Imagine that you are a young beautiful girl with a tasty body, and it can mean only one thing – you’re perfect for… Human sacrifice for an ancient god!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
